column3: Latest;Siem Reap: Police at Siem Reap’s Night Market said at 15:00 on December 24
column5: they received a woman who had come from Phnom Penh by taxi.------When she arrived in Siem Reap
column6: she did not have any money to pay and said something strange about ‘getting rid of the old year and the new year will come’. So the taxi driver took her to the police.------Police said during her interrogation
column8: instead asking authorities to find her some delicious food and rent a hotel for her to sleep.------Later
column15: currently living in Sangkat Phsar Depot II
column17: Phnom Penh.------Police later called her family
column18: who said she had mental problems and was like a child in some ways.------ KPT------*Whether the taxi driver was paid
column19: or she was returned back to Phnom penh is not made clear.
